body: Lime Kiln       The lime kiln, where limestone rocks were fired for conversion to lime plaster, is like all the other structures at Tumacácori National Historical Park - it requires constant maintenance by the Park preservation crew to keep it from deteriorating. It even requires lime plaster to preserve it from moisture.       Photo by Jana Tschopp        Photo by Jana Tschopp        Photo by Jana Tschopp        Photo by Jana Tschopp
title: Tumacácori National Historical Park: Lime Kiln
